name: Love & Soul Food
address: 4 E Gun Hill Rd, Bronx, NY 10469, USA

reviews.text: Delicious food. Friendly staff. Cleanliness.
First time coming and the food, service, and atmosphere was amazing... will definitely be coming back!! I highly recommend this spot if you're in the area.
The owner are from Africa. So you will enjoy food from there and American. So far each food has a great taste and seasoned well. Mt husband loves their lamb chops and collar greens. It's a must try.
Great food i can eat their food everyday

So far I came here 3 times. The first 2 times food was excellent until I decided to try their fried chicken wings. I can tell immediately after 1st bite they were cooked in old reused oil. Disgusting!  Food went into trash. You can't play with people health like that. Now I am nauseous and have nasty taste in my mouth. Not the experience I was looking for. Don't be cheap offer quality, raise price if you have to but dont use poor quality old ingredients
They are very clean and the food is really delicious. I love their food. And the prices are great. The oxtail and salmon are weighed the same as every other food.
I have given the place couple of tries, but the food is straight up bad üòû. How do you even mess up salmon?

food straight up not as good as it looks yams 0/10 , chicken looked like it had been sitting, was dry and unseasoned.
would only recommend mac n cheese and the jerk chicken.

The place is very  tidy and the young man behind counter was very  friendly.  The food was just bland , caught me by surprise it look so good,  but as the saying goes looks can be deceiving and deceiving it was. I had the peas and rice along with the candied yams and macaroni and cheese. All four items lacked flavor and the salmon was extremely dry.
Had a wonderful time i appreciated  the love and the hospitality , such great integrity  god bless

Salmon was absolutely wonderful! He handled my order with excellent customer service ‚Äî answering all my questions and confirming everything with great care. My food was prepared and ordered in a timely manner, and the whole experience was a breath of fresh air! I will definitely order again and again. Highly recommended!

The food was so delicious I forgot to take a picture to post it with this review!! I honestly regret that I did not try this place sooner. I got a two pound plate of food (Jolof rice, macaroni and cheese, four barbecue and three Parmesan wings, some cabbage with carrots, candy yams, corn bread, and a Brisk) for only $24!!! Before leaving, another customer commented, ‚Äúyou won‚Äôt be able to finish all that lol‚Äù and she was right! I had it for lunch and dinner and wasn‚Äôt the least bit dissatisfied. Will definitely come again!!!
Made me sick avoid

Best food around the city. Home cooking everyday, fresh never frozen. The workers are wonderful and pleasant to talk too. I eat here almost every day because I miss home made flavors like this. Keep up the great work.
Love the food me and husband often go on break here .. no complaints

Great food, can be pricy. More so because of the array of options, easy to start stacking a lot if you‚Äôre hungry. The place was clean and they make everyone wear gloves. I‚Äôve went 3 times, all different people, all were nice. One of my go too spots if I‚Äôm In the mood for ‚Äúreal food‚Äù.
Not for nothing the food is not delicious. It is OK. It looks a lot better than it taste for starters spent almost $40 for nothing. I would‚Äôve enjoyed myself more at Burger King.

Well I noticed this little restaurant as I was going to work and said I was going to try them out one day I finally did today I must say the atmosphere and store in general is very well kept and clean the owner she seems very respectful and engaging , although the food didn‚Äôt give much ‚Äúsoul‚Äù it wasn‚Äôt horrible it was decent the greens were more sweet than expected the Mac and cheese was also sweet but I will say the bbq chicken and the fried chicken was really good ‚Ä¶. I will give them another try with a different variety one thing I will say I loveee that it‚Äôs a black own business thriving

i eat around the area before work sometimes, decided to finally try this place out. at first i was kinda surprised my total was more than i had thought but after actually trying the food i didn‚Äôt really care cause it was worth it.

very well seasoned, food was hot and plentiful. very very yummy. if you‚Äôre picky it‚Äôs perfect!!
my food was cold... they should do a better job of keeping the buffet hot..

The staff gives a nice friendly service, the food is amazing and coming from North Carolina to visit, the food is worth an arm and a leg. They got all kinds of food: soul food, Spanish food, African food. They got different food daily, I‚Äôll be back soon for sure.

The food was so delicious the atmosphere was great some light skin lady she was so kind she told me everything I needed to know and she showed me the drink fridge and she offered me some cake I can‚Äôt wait for my birthday I can order some catering

Love & soul food ‚ù§Ô∏è was one of the best place in the bronx ny. Special we all use gloves to serve your self. I come from Richmond, VA to get the food I'm so happy still for for my third time. The lovely lady helped you tell all the details about the food üëå delicious üòã!!!

The staff was very friendly. Especially Mohammed and Abraham that was there sometimes in the afternoon and sometimes at night. I would like if they tell us that oxtail was only served three times a week. Other than that amazing food and amazing stuff.Not to mention, they don‚Äôt mind explaining to you what dish is.

I was highly surprised to find this new soul food/caribbean fusion self-serve restaurant on my way home. It‚Äôs a very tight spot with all the food selections lining the side and rear walls. They have an array of beverages available and although only have banana pudding as a dessert option, are working on expanding their dessert selections.

There are signs asking that customers put gloves on and not talk over the food. Food is weighed by the pound, a little pricey for the residents in the community but most likely optimized for the large hospital presence in the area. I tried the Mac n cheese, fried chicken, collards and yams. The chicken was fried and seasoned well, the  collards were tasty, not overly seasoned yams had a slightly heavy clove taste and as beautiful as the Mac n cheese was presented there was a buttery taste to them.

So overall it was ok, and it‚Äôs definitely the only eatery of its kind in the area so it will definitely gain momentum as word spreads. I will go back and try their other options before determining if they would be a go-to option for me when I‚Äôm in the area.
